quality_assessment: Documentation provides comprehensive default value tables but contains several inaccuracies compared to implementation. Memory storage default is incorrect (documented 100MB vs actual 1GB), and some documented defaults don't exist in the codebase (plugins, max_concurrent_specs, workflow defaults). Tables are well-organized but need accuracy fixes.

issues.description: Memory storage max_memory default value is incorrect
issues.fix_suggestion: Update memory storage default to match implementation in src/storage/config.rs:201

issues.description: Several documented global config defaults don't exist in implementation
issues.should_be: These fields exist in GlobalConfig struct but have no defaults or usage in implementation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add note that plugin system and max_concurrent_specs are legacy/placeholder features not currently used

issues.description: Documented workflow defaults (max_iterations, timeout, continue_on_error) don't have corresponding implementation defaults
issues.current_content: Documents max_iterations: None, timeout: None, continue_on_error: false
issues.should_be: These are workflow fields but no default values are set in WorkflowConfig implementation
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that these are workflow configuration options without built-in defaults, or verify against actual WorkflowConfig defaults

issues.description: Command timeout default documented as 300 seconds, which is correct for command defaults but may be misleading
issues.should_be: This is the default applied by CommandRegistry, not a global default
issues.fix_suggestion: Add clarification that this is the default applied by command validator when command metadata doesn't specify timeout

positive_aspects: Well-organized table format makes defaults easy to reference
Comprehensive coverage of storage, retry, and cache configuration defaults
Clear precedence flow example showing configuration override hierarchy
Good cross-references to related configuration documentation
All internal links are valid and point to existing files
Storage configuration defaults accurately documented (except memory max_memory)
Retry policy defaults correctly documented (max_retries: 3, initial_delay: 1s, etc.)
Cache configuration defaults correctly documented (max_entries: 1000, ttl: 3600s)
Environment variable mappings accurately reflect implementation
improvement_suggestions: Add a note distinguishing between 'implemented and used defaults' vs 'legacy/placeholder fields'
Consider adding examples showing how to override defaults via config files
Add cross-reference to workflow configuration documentation for workflow-specific defaults
Consider adding a 'Default Values by Component' section to group related defaults
Add note about platform-specific paths for prodigy_home (uses ProjectDirs)
Clarify difference between storage backend defaults vs file storage implementation defaults

metadata.validation_focus: Check default values reference documentation matches implementation
